attributes.additional_details: Re look into the digital ID cards system Kier starmer is bringing into power, and make it compulory for the migrants or illegals that enter England - Scotland - Wales - Northern Ireland. We do not agree with this citizens of the land having this thrown upon us, we are a land of free speech and free movement but becoming and treated like prisoners on our own soil
attributes.background:
Do not introduce Digital ID cards
We the British public demand that the UK Government immediately commits to not introducing a digital ID cards for the British people. You say this is to stop imigration, there for introduce these cards to the illegals and migrants that are being brought to England.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not introduce Digital ID cards
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730194
